data.actual_result: It says it was changed to the old bitrate (64.000)
data.expected_result: It should say it was changed to the new bitrate, in my case 96.000
data.short_description: [Audit Log] Changing vc bitrate shows old bitrate
data.steps_to_repro: - Change the bitrate of a voice channel (in my case from 64 to 96) - Check this action in the audit log
